name: places/ChIJ8Q1FuMBZwokRP2UmPWwLljo
adrFormatAddress: 1865 Broadway, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: I am SO glad to have found Dr. Hussain to diagnose and treat my worsening hip pain. Turned out that I have been overtraining for decades. He’s exactly the functional-movement physician I hoped for to help me through this midlife setback. I give thanks that he’s younger than I am so he can help me stay healthy for decades to come. He’s so good, I referred both my son and my life partner to him. Both men - with very different issues - received excellent care. So five stars from all three of us.

originalText.text: I saw Dr. Hussain at the Garden City Summit Health location, where I had one of the best experience's with a doctor and office. I traveled from the city for this appointment as they were able to fit me in next day, where I was met with wonderful staff. I was seen for severe shoulder pain, which was diagnosed day of, with a game plan set in place. Dr. Hussain and assistant Anthony worked hard to get me an MRI day of (unheard of!), and I was then able to see Dr. Hussain within the hour to go over MRI results and discuss next steps. The staff downstairs at imaging were awesome, as well.The urgency and care of the staff and Dr. Hussain was above and beyond, and I would travel from Manhattan to Garden City again and again to assure my health was in good hands like those of Dr. Hussain and staff at his office.

originalText.text: The office refused to check if my insurance will cover the cost and told me they do not know the costs. I called this office to cancel the appointment 4 days before. And the office give me a hard time to send me the cancellation confirmation. Seems like they just want to make money out of playing the procedures.

originalText.text:
I am delighted to write a glowing review for Dr. Munif Hussain, who recently provided exceptional medical care to help remove a foreign body that was stuck in my finger.

He took the time to listen to my concerns and thoroughly examined my finger to determine the best course of action. Dr. Hussain was incredibly patient, explaining the procedure in detail and answering all of my questions to help ease any anxieties I had.

During the removal procedure, Dr. Hussain worked with the utmost care and precision, ensuring that I experienced minimal discomfort. He was constantly checking in on me, making sure that I was comfortable and at ease. Due to his efforts, my finger has fully healed, and I am back to my daily activities without any issues. I would highly recommend Dr. Hussain to anyone in need of medical care, and I can confidently say that he is an exceptional doctor who goes above and beyond for his patients.

originalText.text: Dr Hussain and the staff are wonderful. He is thorough, explained my issue and care very well. He is also professional, caring and extremely efficient. I only have glowing remarks for the numerous visits I needed during the healing of my ankle fracture. Highly recommend Dr Hussain!
